A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It feels like people have covered this well but it cannot be said enough... This is a very poor excuse for a Star Wars movie. It was awful from start to finish. The plot was terribly written and the characters were either disgraces or showed no development whatsoever. I'm a woman and I couldn't stand the amount of toxic feminism. Look I love a strong female character but this movie is so over the top with bringing down male characters and elevating female characters that it becomes ridiculous. Easily the worst Star Wars movie ever made.
